DuplicateRecordItem.name: DuplicateRecordItem
DuplicateRecordItem.description: Represents a record that’s been identified as a duplicate. DuplicateRecordItems are included in a DuplicateRecordSet, which are processed in duplicate jobs. Use this object to create custom report types for duplicates.

DuplicateRecordSetId.description: The duplicate record set that the duplicate record item is assigned to.

Name.description: The autogenerated name that’s given to the Duplicate Record Item. Label is Duplicate Record Item Name.

RecordId.description: The name of the record as it appears on the record’s detail page.
